title: Retirement Advisor: Retrain Your Brain
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Hebbian theory, a neuroscientific explanation of synaptic plasticity, may offer insights for advisors seeking to protect clients against bad investing habits, such as frequent checking of stock prices or tuning into sensational financial infotainment. This podcast (5:02) suggests that people can change for the better, and advised investors can have better outcomes when their advisors educate them toward good investing habits.
